SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM Card WHERE (memberID = #{memberID}) AND (cardIsPaid = FALSE)
SELECT * FROM Card WHERE (memberID = #{memberID}) AND (cardIsPaid = TRUE) ORDER BY payID DESC
SELECT * FROM Card WHERE (cardIsPublic = TRUE) AND (cardIsPaid = TRUE)
SELECT * FROM (SELECT *, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY categoryId ORDER BY cardDate DESC) as rn FROM Card WHERE (cardIsPublic = TRUE) AND (cardIsPaid = TRUE)) ranked WHERE rn = 1;
SELECT * FROM (SELECT *, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY categoryId ORDER BY cardLikeCnt DESC, ABS(DATEDIFF(cardStartDate, NOW())) ASC) as rn FROM Card WHERE cardIsPublic = TRUE) ranked WHERE rn = 1;
